attributes.action: Provide New Mine Protected Armoured Personnel Carriers (APC)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister promised the Army the equipment they needed in Iraq we ask him and his ministers to deliver on that promise and in particular the supply of a 4 or 6 cylinder turbo diesel Mine Protected Armoured Personnel Carriers(APC)designed to protect multi-role forces opertating in a mine threatened environment,a design similar to the Springbuck a South African design would offer our troops a higher degree of ballistic and mine protection coupled with excellent mobility and manoeuvrability. Its V shaped hull offer protection from anti-tank mines with charge equivalent to 14 kg of TNT detonated under any wheel.
